morningBrief.headline: Mother Nature Can't Decide
morningBrief.body: 170 trails open, 32 groomed. Cloud/Sun/Mixed, high of 32. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. It's going to be a mixed bag today. Expect rain below and snow above.
